feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Questions regarding Business Partner Migration via Migration Cockpit in SAP Public Cloud（ID:F3473）
entry.content:
Hi,

I am attempting to migrate Business Partner (BP) master data using the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Migration Cockpit（ID:F3473）.

I understand that the key fields are "Customer Code" and "BP Grouping." However, I would like to know if it's possible to use a BP Grouping other than the standard ones.

I believe the standard groupings are as follows:
BP01
BP02
BP03
BPAB
CPDA
CPDN
CPDS

When I try to perform the migration using a BP Grouping that I created in addition to these, I receive the following error message:
"Assignment of BP grouping XXXX to customer account group is not possible" (Message Class: CNV_DMC_SIN, Message No.: 587)

Is there any specific setting that needs to be configured to resolve the cause of this error?

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: Failed to "Overwrite with Remote Topic Bindings" - S/4HANA Public Cloud and BTP ABAP
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Recently we've been integrating our S/4HANA Public Cloud and BTP ABAP with Event-Driven architecture using Direct Push-Based Integration. where Public Cloud is sending system and BTP ABAP is receiving system.

We've been successfully set everything up at the beginning with only Product Events. Now we've enhanced our event channel with Bill of Material Event and Change Master Event. In BTP ABAP everything looks fine.

However, when we try to "Overwrite with Remote Topic Bindings" in S/4 Public Cloud, it always fails and generates an ABAP runtime error.  

Does anyone have a hint, what could be the reason and how to solve it?

Many thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Tan

entry.title: Significant Performance Degradation on Depreciation Jobs After 2508 Release
entry.content:
Hello SAP , 

 

Issue Summary

 

Since the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition upgrade on August 18, 2025 (release 2508), we have observed a significant increase in execution times for Asset Accounting depreciation jobs triggered via the Schedule Asset Accounting Jobs tile.

 

All company codes are impacted, with processing times now much longer than before the upgrade. The duration depends on the number of fixed assets per company code: MDM SAS France, which has the largest asset volume, is the most affected.

 

Findings and Analysis



  • Before the upgrade (pre-18/08):



    • Full run for all company codes: approx. 20–30 minutes.



  • After the upgrade (post-18/08):



    • MDM France only: up to ~1h35–2h (ledgers 0L and 2L).
    • Other company codes: also impacted, with an increase proportional to asset volume.



  • Tests performed:



    • Comparison before/after on all company → confirmed increase.
    • Job including all company codes (as in production) → very high total duration.
    • Tests in quality environment, at two time slots:



      • Business hours (midday)
      • Off-hours (10 PM)
        → Same result: processing time remains significantly higher than before the upgrade, regardless of schedule.





Business Impact



  • Delays in period-end closing and financial reporting.
  • Increased complexity in scheduling jobs, even during off-peak hours.



Environment Details



  • Product: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
  • Release: 2508 (upgrade on 18/08/2025)
  • Applications:



    • Schedule Asset Accounting Jobs (F1914) – job templates used:



      • Recalculate Depreciation
      • Depreciation Posting Run



    • Application Jobs – monitoring and logs



  • Functional Area: FI-AA (Asset Accounting)
  • Impacted Company Codes: All 
  • Ledgers: 0L, 2L



Steps to Reproduce

  1. Open Schedule Asset Accounting Jobs .
  2. Run Recalculate Depreciation for a given period (e.g., August 2025) for a company code (e.g., MDM France).
  3. Then run Depreciation Posting Run for the same period.
  4. Check duration in Application Jobs.

 

Attachments Provided



  • Screenshots:



    • Processing times before upgrade
    • Processing times after upgrade



  • Excel file: comparison of durations by company code, ledger, and job type.
  • Job IDs and logs from Application Jobs.



Checks Already Performed



  • Ensured proper sequencing: Recalculate → Posting.
  • Tested splitting by company code and staggering ledgers.
  • Tested during off-peak hours (10 PM) → no improvement.
  • Confirmed that all company codes are impacted, with impact proportional to asset volume.



Expected Outcome



  • SAP analysis to confirm whether this is a performance regression introduced by release 2508.
  • Recommendations or fixes .



Best regards ,

entry.title: How to make storage location field READ-ONLY in CO11N screen in SAP S/4 HANA PUBLIC EDITION?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

Could you please advise on how to make the Storage Location field read-only in the CO11N transaction, under the Goods Movement tab

We would like to restrict manual editing of this field during confirmation.

Any guidance or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Regards,

Sai Bhargav

entry.title: How to trace the service confirmation document and its accounting impact in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public
entry.content:
We are currently implementing the Sales module in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition for a service company. The customer only works with service materials.

The sales process is as follows:

  • Sales Contract (quantity-based)

  • Sales Order

  • Preliminary Billing Document (Proforma)

  • Invoice

The customer does not work with billing plans.

The requirement is to trigger provisional revenue recognition when the Preliminary Billing Document (Proforma) is created, and then reverse this entry once the final invoice is posted. We are aware that the Proforma does not generate accounting postings, so most likely we will need to build something in SAP BTP.

 We are testing a scenario where we create a “phantom goods issue” because revenue recognition is usually triggered at the goods issue confirmation.

  • We are using a non-stock material.

  • The sales order item category is TAX (non-stock).

  • Then we create and post an outbound delivery.

  • As a result, the system generates an Outbound Delivery Document and a Service Confirmation Document.

The issue:
We cannot find any way to track or display this Service Confirmation Document in the system. We would like to know:

  1. Does this Service Confirmation Document generate any accounting postings in Public Cloud?

  2. Where can this document be viewed or traced in the available Fiori apps?

Has anyone faced a similar requirement or can point us in the right direction?

Thanks in advance for your support! 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Sales SD (Sales and Distribution) SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: Cannot activate flexible transport mode in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
Hello

I want to toggle the switch of Flexible Transport Mode to ON, but it's read-only, cannot change.

I am in the Development system's customizing tenant, and released all open customizing transport requests.

 

3590958 - Error during setup of Communication Arrangement - "Activate Flexible Mode in the Extensibility Settings app first."

entry.title: Company Code Specific Customer Data Return - Extration
entry.content:
Dear Team,

 

As per localization requirements, we are required to store Country specific entity business information.

To address this, SAP provides the option to download data using Fiori applications such as Customer Data Return – Extraction and Customer Data Return – Provision.

 

Problem Statement:
We do not see an option to select company code in these two fiori applications.

Could you please advise how we can download the data filtered by company code or country?

 

Thanks & Regards,
Naveen

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Test系统里新建的Business Role 可以直接从T系统里操作传到P系统吗？
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

如果只在T系统copy标准的business role，并增加Business catalogs，有简便的方法把自定义的Business role直接从T系统传到P系统吗？

如果不能直接从T系统传到P系统，我是否只能把business role在D系统重新创建并传输到T，再forward到P系统？如果Business role的命名保持不变，原来的T系统的business role也会被新传输的role覆盖吧？

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: How to display custom MIGO fields in Stock – Multiple Materials app (S/4HANA Public Cloud)
entry.content:
Hi All,
In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, we have enhanced the Post Goods Movement (MIGO) screen by adding a few custom fields. These custom fields are used to capture additional details (such as description, values, etc.) during the Production Order against Goods Receipt process.

Our requirement is to make these custom fields visible and reportable in the Stock – Multiple Materials Fiori application/report so that business users can track and analyze this additional information along with the stock data.

We tried to extend these fields to the Stock – Multiple Materials Fiori app via Custom Fields → Data Source Extension, but the data source used in this app does not allow extension with our custom fields.

Could you please suggest the best possible approach to achieve this in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

entry.title: How to distinguish the Valuation Class of T stock and E stock in pubulic cloud?
entry.content: In the OP version, if both POD and MTO need to be used simultaneously, there may be conflicts in the Valuation Class, which can be resolved through BADI（MB_SAPLMBME_TKLAS）. What are the better solutions for the public cloud version?

entry.title: Posting date in Manage Bank Statements app
entry.content:

We would like to know if there is an option for when we upload the statement via Excel, as well as when we do so via the upload provided by the bank, whereby we can modify the posting date and it does not have to be the statement date.

entry.title: Replicate by Replication Model App in SAP Cloud ERP
entry.content:
Hi everyone !
We are trying to access DRF, Replicate by Replication Model app in SAP Cloud ERP ( SAP Public Cloud ). https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('DRF_ADHOC_REPLICATION()')/S35
Scope 1RO is active. 
Business Role SAP_BR_CONF_EXPERT_BUS_NET_INT was used  as template. Realized it didn't had the Business Catalog SAP_CA_BC_DATA_REP_PC, so I've added it.

This is the business Role: ( access categories are all Unrestricted )

Business Catalog:

App is in the Business catalog:

 

What am I missing?

Thanks in advance.


EDIT - So, after a few hours looking on this with Integration consultant, decided to create again the Business Role based on the standard one .. correct launchpad space appeared, can find the app now. 
Lesson learned: Create again the Business Role based on the standard business role ..
